interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: MIZON Cicaluronic Line, Cicaluronic Cleansing Balm, Makeup Remover, Centella Asiatica,Hyaluronic Acid, One Step Cleansing (2.7 fl oz)
Review Date: 2020/12/16
Store: MIZON
Average Rating: 4.5
Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '2.99 x 2.91 x 2.05 inches; 6.74 Ounces', 'Item model number': '8809606850345'}
Review Text: I do like this cleanser, but beware if you have oily skin. It is super oily. I also do not feel like it takes off the dirt as well as other cleaners. My skin feels super soft after. I also think the packaging is super cute, and I appreciate the included applicator.  I love products with hyaluronic acid, so I am a fan of this product, especially for morning use.
Review Title: Good
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
lootaan 500 Pieces False Nails French Acrylic Fake Nails Tips Half Cover Artificial Fake Nails With Box and False Nail Clipper for Women Girl lootaan {'Material': 'Acrylic', 'Brand': 'lootaan', 'Number of Pieces': '500', 'Package Dimensions': '9 x 6 x 2 inches; 8.01 Ounces', 'UPC': '710157699223'} The nails are ok quality. They are thin and flexible. However, if your nails are on the small side, these may be challenging to use. I had to file the smallest size down to use on my pinky nails. They were decently easy to work with, but I was a little frustrated that the listing was not as described. I filed them with an e file. I began dipping my nails at home due to COVID. I am not a professional, but I am decent at working with nails. I will still use these, but I would not purchase again-especially because I can only use half of them. A little large and I did not receive clippers BEPHOLAN Natural Eyelash Growth Serum and Brow Enhancer to Grow Thicker, Longer Lashes for Long, Luscious Lashes and Eyebrows|10ML BEPHOLAN {'Package Dimensions': '5.94 x 1.18 x 1.06 inches; 0.88 Ounces'} I have tried to use this product for 3 weeks, but I cannot see any difference. There is barely any product in the tube. It is practically dry. You have to reinsert the wand multiple times just to get any coverage on your lashes. I cannot tell any difference except maybe they are softer. I do feel like when I use mascara after this product, the lashes seem fuller. I was really hopeful to see growth.

Once I tried this product on my eyebrows, it seemed to make them fuller (what little product I could get out). I do not think this product is worth the price. I wish I would have got the mascara wand MIZON Cicaluronic Line, Cicaluronic Cleansing Balm, Makeup Remover, Centella Asiatica,Hyaluronic Acid, One Step Cleansing (2.7 fl oz) MIZON {'Package Dimensions': '2.99 x 2.91 x 2.05 inches; 6.74 Ounces', 'Item model number': '8809606850345'} I do like this cleanser, but beware if you have oily skin. It is super oily. I also do not feel like it takes off the dirt as well as other cleaners. My skin feels super soft after. I also think the packaging is super cute, and I appreciate the included applicator. I love products with hyaluronic acid, so I am a fan of this product, especially for morning use. Good
profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Nail Care Enthusiast**: The user exhibits a strong interest in nail aesthetics, particularly acrylic nails and at-home nail care applications.

- **Skill Level**: They possess moderate skills in nail application and maintenance, including experience with e-files for DIY enhancements.

- **Preference for Practicality and Effectiveness**: The user prioritizes the usability and effectiveness of beauty products. They recently expressed frustration with products yielding minimal results or inadequate quantities, reflecting a need for quality and performance.

- **Quality Sensitivity**: A discerning eye for quality is evident, leading to disappointment when products fall short of expectations. They prefer more robust materials and effective formulations, highlighting their commitment to high standards.

- **Shopping Behavior**: Hesitancy to repurchase items that don't meet their standards indicates that previous experiences significantly influence future purchasing decisions.

- **Adaptability**: The user demonstrates a willingness to modify products to suit personal needs, showcasing resourcefulness in beauty applications.

- **Skepticism Towards New Products**: A cautious approach towards new beauty products is evident, particularly those lacking clear or fast results. However, they recently engaged positively with a cleanser that provides a soft feeling post-use, despite concerns about effectiveness for oily skin.

This user profile reflects a balance between nail care passion and a discerning attitude towards broader beauty products, emphasizing practicality, quality, and performance.
